00083                 function ActiveRecord($_values = NULL)
00084                 {
00085                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00086                         
00087                         $classname = get_class($this);
00088                         $initialized = self::_is_initialized($classname);
00089                         if (!$initialized)
00090                         {
00091                                 $conn->prepare("DESCRIBE `{1}`",
00092                                         $this->get_table_name());
00093                                 $conn->exec();
00094                                 $columns = array();
00095                                 while ($row = $conn->fetch_assoc())
00096                                 {
00097                                         $columns[] = $row['Field'];
00098                                 }
00099                                 self::_set_columns($classname, $columns);
00100                                 self::_set_initialized($classname, TRUE);
00101                         }
00102                         $columns = self::_get_columns($classname);
00103                         if (!empty($_values))
00104                         {
00105                                 $this->values = array();
00106                                 foreach ($_values as $key => $val)
00107                                 {
00108                                         $keyexists = in_array($key, $columns);
00109                                         if ($keyexists)
00110                                         {
00111                                                 $this->values[$key] = (get_magic_quotes_gpc()) ? stripslashes($val) : $val;
00112                                         }
00113                                 }
00114                         }
00115                         $this->init($_values);
00116                         
00117                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00118                 }
00119

00128                 }

00138                 {
00139                         if (!$this->table_name)
00140                         {
00141                                 $classname = get_class($this);
00142                                 $this->table_name = class_name_to_table_name($classname);
00143                         }
00144                         return $this->table_name;

00174                                 $this->primary_key = 'id';

00183                 private function has_column($key)
00184                 {
00185                         $classname = get_class($this);
00186                         $columns = self::_get_columns($classname);
00187                         return in_array($key, $columns);
00188                 }

00194                 public function belongs_to($table_name)
00195                 {
00196                         $classname = get_class($this);
00197                         $columns = self::_get_columns($classname);
00198                         $ownerclass = table_name_to_class_name($table_name);
00199                         $owner = eval("return new {$ownerclass}();");
00200                         if (in_array(table_name_to_foreign_key($table_name), $columns))
00201                         {
00202                                 $owner->find_by_id($this->values[table_name_to_foreign_key($table_name)]);
00203                         }
00204                         else if (in_array($owner->foreign_key_name, $columns))
00205                         {
00206                                 $owner->find_by_id($this->values[$owner->foreign_key_name]);
00207                         }
00208                         $this->values[singularize($table_name)] = $owner;
00209                         $owner->values[singularize($this->table_name)] = $this;
00210                 }
00211 
00218                 public function has_many($table_name, $params = array())
00219                 {
00220                         $childclass = table_name_to_class_name($table_name);
00221                         $obj = eval("return new {$childclass}();");
00222                         $fkey = $this->get_foreign_key_name();
00223                         if (isset($params['where_clause']))
00224                         {
00225                                 $params['where_clause'] = "({$params['where_clause']}) AND `{$fkey}` = '{$this->values[$this->primary_key]}' ";
00226                         }
00227                         else
00228                         {
00229                                 $params['where_clause'] = "`{$fkey}` = '{$this->values[$this->primary_key]}' ";
00230                         }
00231                         $children = $obj->find_all($params);
00232                         if (count($children) > 0)
00233                         {
00234                                 foreach ($children as $child)
00235                                 {
00236                                         $child->values[singularize($this->table_name)] = $this;
00237                                 }
00238                                 $this->values[$table_name] = $children;
00239                         }
00240                 }

00248                 public function has_and_belongs_to_many($table_name, $params = array())
00249                 {
00250                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00251                         
00252                         $peerclass = table_name_to_class_name($table_name);
00253                         $peer = eval("return new {$peerclass}();");
00254                         $fkey = $this->get_foreign_key_name();
00255                         $peer_fkey = $peer->get_foreign_key_name();
00256                         
00257                         // By convention, relation table name is the union of
00258                         // the two member tables' names joined by an underscore
00259                         // in alphabetical order
00260                         $table_names = array($table_name, $this->table_name);
00261                         sort($table_names);
00262                         $relation_table = implode('_', $table_names);
00263                         
00264                         $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM `{1}` WHERE `{2}` = '{3}'",
00265                                 $relation_table,
00266                                 $fkey,
00267                                 $this->values[$this->primary_key]);
00268                         $conn->exec();
00269                         //print_r($conn->query);
00270                         if ($conn->num_rows() > 0)
00271                         {
00272                                 $this->values[$table_name] = array();
00273                                 while ($row = $conn->fetch_assoc())
00274                                 {
00275                                         $peer = eval("return new {$peerclass}();");
00276                                         $peer->find_by_id($row[$peer_fkey]);
00277                                         $this->values[$table_name][] = $peer;
00278                                         $peer->values[$this->table_name] = array($this);
00279                                         //print_r($peer);
00280                                 }
00281                         }
00282                         $conn->free_result();
00283                         
00284                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00285                 }

00293                 public function has_one($table_name)
00294                 {
00295                         $childclass = table_name_to_class_name($table_name);
00296                         $obj = eval("return new {$childclass}();");
00297                         $fkey = $this->get_foreign_key_name();
00298                         $children = $obj->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`{$fkey}` = {$this->values[$this->primary_key]}", 'limit' => 1));
00299                         if (count($children) > 0)
00300                         {
00301                                 $child = $children[0];
00302                                 $child->values[singularize($this->table_name)] = $this;
00303                                 $this->values[singularize($table_name)] = $child;
00304                         }
00305                 }

00317                 public function find_by_query($query)
00318                 {
00319                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00320                         
00321                         $ret = NULL;
00322                         
00323                         $conn->prepare($query);
00324                         $conn->exec();
00325                         if ($conn->num_rows() > 0)
00326                         {
00327                                 $classname = get_class($this);
00328                                 $results = array();
00329                                 while ($row = $conn->fetch_assoc())
00330                                 {
00331                                         $obj = eval("return new {$classname}();");
00332                                         $obj->find_by_id($row[$this->primary_key]);
00333                                         $results[] = $obj;
00334                                 }
00335                                 $ret = $results;
00336                         }
00337                         $conn->free_result();
00338 
00339                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00340                         
00341                         return $ret;
00342                 }

00354                 function find_all($params = array())
00355                 {
00356                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00357                         
00358                         if (empty($params['where_clause']))
00359                         {
00360                                 $params['where_clause'] = '1';
00361                         }
00362                         if (empty($params['order_by']))
00363                         {
00364                                 $params['order_by'] = "`{$this->primary_key}` ASC";
00365                         }
00366                         if (empty($params['limit']))
00367                         {
00368                                 $params['limit'] = 999;
00369                         }
00370                         if (empty($params['start']))
00371                         {
00372                                 $params['start'] = 0;
00373                         }
00374                         
00375                         $ret = NULL;
00376                         
00377                         $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM `{1}` WHERE (1 AND ({$params['where_clause']})) ORDER BY {$params['order_by']} LIMIT {$params['start']}, {$params['limit']}",
00378                                 $this->get_table_name());
00379                         $conn->exec();
00380                         if ($conn->num_rows() > 0)
00381                         {
00382                                 $classname = get_class($this);
00383                                 $results = array();
00384                                 while ($row = $conn->fetch_assoc())
00385                                 {
00386                                         $obj = eval("return new {$classname}();");
00387                                         $obj->find_by_id($row[$this->primary_key]);
00388                                         $results[] = $obj;
00389                                 }
00390                                 $ret = $results;
00391                         }
00392                         $conn->free_result();
00393 
00394                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00395                         
00396                         return $ret;
00397                 }

00408                 {

00410                         $obj->find_by_id($id);

00421                 public function find_by_id($id)
00422                 {
00423                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00424 
00425                         $ret = FALSE;
00426                         
00427                         $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM `{1}` WHERE `{$this->primary_key}` = '{2}' LIMIT 1",
00428                                 $this->get_table_name(),
00429                                 $id);
00430                         $conn->exec();
00431                         if ($conn->num_rows() > 0)
00432                         {
00433                                 $classname = get_class($this);
00434                                 $columns = self::_get_columns($classname);
00435                                 $values = $conn->fetch_assoc();
00436                                 foreach ($columns as $column)
00437                                 {
00438                                         $this->values[$column] = $values[$column];
00439                                 }
00440                                 self::_add_to_pool($classname, $id, $this);
00441                                 
00442                                 $ret = TRUE;
00443                         }
00444                         
00445                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00446 
00447                         return $ret;
00448                 }

00459                 public function save()
00460                 {
00461                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00462                         
00463                         $classname = get_class($this);
00464                         $columns = self::_get_columns($classname);
00465 
00466                         $nonempty = array();
00467                         for ($i = 0; $i < count($columns); $i++)
00468                         {
00469                                 if (isset($this->values[$columns[$i]]))
00470                                 {
00471                                         $nonempty[] = $columns[$i];
00472                                 }
00473                         }
00474 
00475                         if (!empty($this->values[$this->primary_key]))
00476                         {
00477                                 $query = "UPDATE `{1}` SET ";
00478                                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($nonempty); $i++)
00479                                 {
00480                                         $query .= "`{$nonempty[$i]}` = '{$conn->escape($this->values[$nonempty[$i]])}'";
00481                                         if ($i < count($nonempty) - 1)
00482                                         {
00483                                                 $query .= ", ";
00484                                         }
00485                                 }
00486                                 $query .= " WHERE `{$this->primary_key}` = '{2}' LIMIT 1";
00487                                 $conn->prepare($query,
00488                                         $this->get_table_name(),
00489                                         $this->values[$this->primary_key]);
00490                                 $conn->exec();
00491                         }
00492                         else
00493                         {
00494                                 $query = "INSERT INTO `{1}` (";
00495                                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($nonempty); $i++)
00496                                 {
00497                                         $query .= "`{$nonempty[$i]}`";
00498                                         if ($i < count($nonempty) - 1)
00499                                         {
00500                                                 $query .= ", ";
00501                                         }
00502                                 }
00503                                 $query .= ") VALUES (";
00504                                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($nonempty); $i++)
00505                                 {
00506                                         $query .= "'{$conn->escape($this->values[$nonempty[$i]])}'";
00507                                         if ($i < count($nonempty) - 1)
00508                                         {
00509                                                 $query .= ", ";
00510                                         }
00511                                 }
00512                                 $query .= ")";
00513                                 $conn->prepare($query,
00514                                         $this->get_table_name());
00515                                 $conn->exec();
00516                                 $this->values[$this->primary_key] = $conn->insert_id();
00517                         }
00518                         
00519                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00520                         
00521                         return TRUE;
00522                 }

00532                 public function delete($optimize = TRUE)
00533                 {
00534                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00535                         
00536                         if (!empty($this->values[$this->primary_key]))
00537                         {
00538                                 $conn->prepare("DELETE FROM `{1}` WHERE `{$this->primary_key}` = '{2}' LIMIT 1",
00539                                         $this->get_table_name(),
00540                                         $this->values[$this->primary_key]);
00541                                 $conn->exec();
00542                                 
00543                                 // Clean up
00544                                 if ($optimize)
00545                                 {
00546                                         $conn->prepare("OPTIMIZE TABLE `{1}`",
00547                                                 $this->get_table_name());
00548                                         $conn->exec();
00549                                 }
00550                         }
00551                         
00552                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00553                 }

00572                 public function permalink($relative = TRUE)
00573                 {
00574                         $relative_url = $this->relative_url();
00575                         return $relative ?
00576                                 sprintf('%s%s',
00577                                         APPLICATION_ROOT,
00578                                         $relative_url) :
00579                                 sprintf('http://%s%s%s',
00580                                         $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00581                                         APPLICATION_ROOT,
00582                                         $relative_url);
00583                 }

00597                 public function __set($key, $value)
00598                 {
00599                         if ($this->has_column($key))
00600                         {
00601                                 $this->values[$key] = $value;
00602                         }
00603                         else
00604                         {
00605                                 $this->$key = $value;
00606                         }
00607                 }
00608 
00613                 public function __get($key)
00614                 {
00615                         if (array_key_exists($key, $this->values))
00616                         {
00617                                 return $this->values[$key];
00618                         }
00619                         else if (isset($this->$key))
00620                         {
00621                                 return $this->$key;
00622                         }
00623                         return NULL;
00624                 }
00625 
00630                 public function __isset($key)
00631                 {
00632                         if (!(isset($this->values) && !empty($this->values)))
00633                         {
00634                                 return FALSE;
00635                         }
00636                         if (array_key_exists($key, $this->values))
00637                         {
00638                                 return TRUE;
00639                         }
00640                         else if (isset($this->$key))
00641                         {
00642                                 return TRUE;
00643                         }
00644                         return FALSE;
00645                 }

00655                 private static function _set_initialized($classname, $initialized)
00656                 {
00657                         self::$class_initialized[$classname] = $initialized;

00659                 
00665                 private static function _is_initialized($classname)
00666                 {
00667                         if (!isset(self::$class_initialized[$classname]))
00668                         {
00669                                 return FALSE;
00670                         }
00671                         return self::$class_initialized[$classname];
00672                 }

00680                 {
00681                         self::$columns[$classname] = $cols;

00688                 private static function _get_columns($classname)
00689                 {
00690                         if (!isset(self::$class_initialized[$classname]))
00691                         {
00692                                 return NULL;
00693                         }
00694                         return self::$columns[$classname];
00695                 }

00703                 private static function _add_to_pool($classname, $id, $obj)
00704                 {
00705                         if (!isset(self::$object_pool[$classname]))
00706                         {
00707                                 self::$object_pool[$classname] = array();
00708                         }
00709                         self::$object_pool[$classname][$id] = $obj;
00710                 }
00711                 
00717                 private static function _get_from_pool($classname, $id)
00718                 {
00719                         if (!isset(self::$object_pool[$classname]) ||
00720                                 !isset(self::$object_pool[$classname][$id]))
00721                         {
00722                                 return NULL;
00723                         }
00724                         return self::$object_pool[$classname][$id];
00725                 }
00726         }
00727         
00728         if (version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '5') < 0)
00729         {
00730                 if (function_exists("overload"))
00731                 {
00732                         overload('ActiveRecord');
00733                 }
